name: Fra Diavolo Sauce With Pasta
author: MARBALET
summary: This sauce includes shrimp and scallops, best served with linguine pasta.
ingredients: 3 cups whole peeled tomatoes with liquid, chopped
8 ounces small shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a large saucepan, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil with the garlic over medium heat
When the garlic starts to sizzle, pour in the tomatoes
Season with salt and red pepper
Lower the heat, and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain
In a large skillet, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil over high heat
Cook for about 2 minutes, stirring frequently, or until the shrimp turn pink
Add shrimp and scallops to the tomato mixture, and stir in the parsley
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes, or until the sauce just begins to bubble
